venue.name: Nutts Pond - Precourt Park - Off of South Willow

item.description:
Nutts Pond

Remember to Bring Poop Plastic Bags

This area is 95% fenced in. As long as we keep a good eye on the pups and keep them occupied they should stay with us.

At the end of the fields there is a small bridge that leads to a paved path (rail trail). It is rather short but there is a nice beach for the water babies.

DIRECTIONS
The entrance is exactly where the entrance to Wendy's is.
Drive all the way down, about 200-300 feet to get to the parking lot.
item.how_to_find_us: If the soccer field is taken look for us in one of the back Baseball Fields

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Precourt Park - Nutts Pond - Off South Willow
